Title: The great leader Chairman Mao's treasured gift to the Workers' Mao Zedong Thought Propaganda Teams of the capital - a mango
Notes: The Mao quote on top reads:Highest InstructionOur country has 700 million people, with the workers as the leading class. It is imperative that the working class realizes its full potential in all the work of the Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution. The working class also continually has to heighten its own political viewpoint in the thick of struggle.
